title: Andrew Bridgen – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Bridgen, the Conservative MP for North West Leicestershire, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content: During this summer’s campaign I was certain that Rishi Sunak was the right man to lead our country through the current crisis and to a brighter future.
I am still certain that is the case. My support for @Ready4Rishi remains strong.
